name: preachiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of seeming to want to give moral advice, even when this is not wanted or needed: The show's preachiness irritates many viewers. Preachiness has always been a weakness of his.
More examplesFewer examplesThe book's most unwelcome aspect is its heavy-handed preachiness.On screen he avoids preachiness because his films don't pretend to answer tough moral questions.Those who most need to hear these inconvenient truths might be might be put off by the preachiness.
